library.empty_state: Select a game from the list

settings.title: Settings
settings.username_hint: Displayed in the sidebar and used for personalization.
settings.language_hint: Enter 'english' or 'german' (restart required for some changes).
settings.rawg_hint: Required for fetching game covers, screenshots, and metadata.
settings.debrid_hint: Unlocks premium download speeds for supported hosts.
settings.tools_hint: These tools are required for advanced features like media conversion and compression.
settings.sandbox_hint: Windows Sandbox provides a lightweight desktop environment to safely run applications in isolation. (Requires Windows 11 Pro)
settings.locations_hint: SyntaxRipper scans these folders for installed games. Force Update re-scans all executables.
settings.resume_hint: Automatically resume pending downloads when the application starts.
settings.install_path_hint: Where games downloaded via the launcher will be installed.
settings.dl_cache_hint: Temporary location for active downloads and archives before unpacking.
settings.speed_hint: Enable to restrict download bandwidth. Limit applies when the switch is ON.
settings.auto_update_hint: Automatically check for and download new versions of installed games (if supported).
settings.dry_launch_hint: Skips background save path detection. Keeps only playtime tracking.
settings.verbose_hint: Enable detailed logs for debugging purposes.
settings.controller_hint: Enable navigation using a gamepad or arrow keys.
settings.show_hidden_hint: Reveal games that have been hidden from the library.
settings.random_hint: If enabled, the random game picker will include games that are not currently installed.
settings.discord_hint: Show what you are playing on your Discord profile.
settings.gaming_mode_hint: Automatically optimize power plan and process priority when launching a game.
settings.clean_meta_desc: Clear all downloaded images and metadata.
settings.clean_dl_desc: Clear all temporary download files and partial archives.
settings.open_logs_desc: Open the application log folder for debugging.
settings.clean_saves_desc: Remove known orphaned save data folders.
settings.fix_files_desc: Exclude all game folders from Windows Defender to prevent missing files.
settings.restart_desc: Restart the application to apply deep configuration changes.
